text:
@marcorubio that's not "good news", you complete buffoon.

regardless of what people are in hospital for, not having room to accommodate ANYONE means people will die, whether they have Covid-19 or cancer, etc.

the first week of August is 3 weeks away.

why don'tcha pray about it?
